title: Getting an S with uncommon picks
body:
So I've been wondering, how do you get an S with non original roles. I main Sion support, and I just got him level 5, and I'm trying to get him level 6, how would you do that playing a guy that is generally top lane support. I just went 1/9/30 something, and got a B+. I think you need to get lots of CS, and help with towers or stuff like that. So yeah... anyone got any advice on S's with Sion as support instead of top lane?

(Also did I put this in the wrong section of the boards?)

replies.body:
If you are playing Sion support, you don't need to get CS. 

You just need to play better than the other players that play sion support. I don't see much of it, however I would assume that Sion supports usually come out with high vision scores, relatively low deaths and a few kills. 

Keep at it, you will get there eventually ♥
